## DatabaseConnection.batch() method

Execute batch \*

**Signature:**

```typescript
batch(stmts: Step[], attributes?: {
        name: string;
        value: object;
    }[]): Promise<any[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  stmts | [Step](./forms42core.sqlstep.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The statements to execute in a batch. |
|  attributes | { name: string; value: object; }\[\] | _(Optional)_ Additional attributes for the batch. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any\[\]&gt;

A promise that resolves to an array of results for each statement in the batch.
